docs.snippet: More than a decade after it was launched to revitalize lower Manhattan following the September 11 attacks, the Tribeca Film Festival has become a showcase for documentaries and independent films as well as a testing ground for new talent and digit...
docs.lead_paragraph: More than a decade after it was launched to revitalize lower Manhattan following the September 11 attacks, the Tribeca Film Festival has become a showcase for documentaries and independent films as well as a testing ground for new talent and digital innovations in cinema.

headline.main: Tribeca Film Fest Offers Eclectic Mix of Documentary, Indie Films

docs.snippet: Full Bunny Contact, a new Easter-themed carnival on the Lower East Side, offers strategic combat with people dressed up like rabbits, a booth where you can dunk Jesus, and more....
docs.lead_paragraph: Full Bunny Contact, a new Easter-themed carnival on the Lower East Side, offers strategic combat with people dressed up like rabbits, a booth where you can dunk Jesus, and more.
docs.abstract: Timothy Haskell, creator of New York's Nightmare Halloween attractions, has moved into Easter-themed territory with interactive attraction Full Bunny Contact at Clemente Soto Velez Cultural and Educational Center; carnival, which features game booths, food trucks, DJ and bar, is saucy and secular event designed to appeal to adults.

headline.seo: Full Bunny Contact, a Subversive Easter Carnival
